citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The primary enclosure den/shelter area and the food bowls are not being cleaned and sanitized at least once every two
weeks. Several of the dens and bowls are dirty with a layer of grime and debris. These dens and food bowls must be
cleaned and sanitized at the minimum frequency of every two weeks or more often to reduce the grime and debris in the
dens. This needs to be addressed for the health of the animals.
Correct by: May 16, 2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
In dens # 30 and 31 there was an infestation of ants in the den box, around and in the food bowl. In den #46, there was
an accumulation of flies around a female and her puppies. There is currently no program or measures being taken to
mitigates pests in these dens. This needs to be addressed to reduce contamination by pests and for the comfort of the
dogs.
Correct by: May 7, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
